titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Miami Heat for winning the 2013 National Basketball Association Finals.
A resolution congratulating the Miami Heat for winning the 2013 National Basketball Association Finals.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the Miami Heat on its victory in the 2013 National Basketball Association Finals.
